professional_summary: Database Administrator/Developer with expertise in MS SQL Server, IBM DB2, Oracle 11g, and MySQL. Experienced in ETL jobs, database replication, query optimization, and team leadership.

key_responsibilities: Manage and optimize large-scale databases for performance and scalability.
Implement ETL processes to enhance data integration capabilities.
Configure and maintain database replication across multiple environments.
Lead database administration teams to ensure high availability and disaster recovery.
Design and deploy data warehouse solutions for business intelligence applications.
Optimize SQL queries and indexes for improved system performance.
